description:
The severed arm of Zeus--the God Scrander! With it, Mazinger Z is even more powerful than before. But Mazinger Z isn`t the only one getting new toys. Will it be enough, however, when Dr. Hell gets serious?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grudge! The longest Day of the Kurogane House (Last Part)
Ikon! Kuroganeya no Ichiban Nagai Hi (Kouhen)
¡Rencor! ¡El día más largo de la Mansión Kurogane! (Última Parte)
遺恨! くろがね屋の一番長い日 (後編)
